title: McDowell on Chicago & San Diego Races!
description: Michael McDowell's strong start at the Chicago Street Race ended in disappointment two weeks ago.  He led for 31 laps from the outside pole position but ultimately fell short of victory.  Now, his hopes for revenge will have to wait.  This setback means a potential delay of at least two years before he gets another chance at redemption in a similar race.  McDowell shifts his focus to the upcoming San Diego challenge, aiming to put the Chicago race behind him and achieve success elsewhere.  Find out more about his thoughts on the Chicago race and his plans for San Diego.  Get ready for an exciting update on his racing career.
